name: boston_star_p1_flex
description: P1.1.1: Boston housing raw -> star schema fact (snake_case) using Dataflow Flex Template.

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: GCP project id used by the pipeline.

parameters.name: region
parameters.label: Region
parameters.helpText: GCP region for the Dataflow job.

parameters.name: temp_location
parameters.label: GCS Temp Location
parameters.helpText: GCS path for temporary files (e.g. gs://bucket/tmp/).

parameters.name: input_table
parameters.label: Input BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: Input table in BigQuery, e.g. project.raw.boston_raw.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: Output table in BigQuery, e.g. project.star.boston_fact_p1.
